name: One Pot Pasta
description: One pot pasta dishes are great to make in a pinch on busy weeknights with whatever’s in your fridge and pantry. Follow the recipe for a perfectly balanced plate or choose your own adventure with your choice of protein, veggies, pasta, and liquid (try milk, tomato juice, or prepared Nourish Broth instead of water). The pasta-bilities are endless! Marinara Sauce Mix and Pizza Seasoning offer aromatic garlic and herb flavours to make any dish delicious no matter what ingredients you choose to use.

ingredients.name: Marinara Sauce Mix or Bruschetta Seasoning

preparation: In a large pan, brown beef. Drain excess fat.
Add seasoning, pasta, water, crushed and diced tomatoes, and olive oil
Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 12–15 min.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
